metadata.title: 5013-1 -- systemd vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that systemd incorrectly handled certain mount paths. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to cause systemd to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2021-33910)  Mitchell Frank discovered that systemd incorrectly handled DHCP FORCERENEW packets. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to reconfigure servers. (CVE-2020-13529)
